name: rdtrip-mvp
description: AI-powered road trip planner from Aix-en-Provence

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd landing-react && npm install --include=dev && VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN=$VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf public/landing-react && cp -r landing-react/dist public/landing-react && cd spotlight-react && npm install --include=dev && VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN=$VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf public/spotlight-new && cp -r spotlight-react/dist public/spotlight-new

author: Chedly
